episodes.description:
A survivor-centered look at the Verulam Hare Krishna temple collapse in South Africa — exposing the negligence, cult dynamics, and global pattern of harm tied to ISKCON. This tragedy wasn’t just structural — it was systemic.

My article will appear on https://www.dehek.com

episodes.title: JIM BAKKER: AMERICA'S MOST PERSISTENT TELEVANGELIST GRIFTER
episodes.description:
#JimBakkerExposed
#televangelist 
#consumerprotection 

Jim Bakker has been scamming audiences for decades! From the PTL Club scandals of the 1980s to his modern-day “prepper buckets” and miracle cure pitches. In this video, we dive into the unbelievable story of America’s most persistent televangelist grifter: how he built an empire on fear and faith, the collapse that landed him in prison, and his relentless comeback attempts.

This isn’t just about one man, it’s about the machinery of televangelism, the exploitation of trust, and why Bakker keeps finding new ways to reinvent himself despite a trail of lawsuits, fraud charges, and regulatory crackdowns.

Be sure to share all your thoughts down below!

#eckankar
#cultsandextremebeliefs

Today, I want to take a moment and discuss cult propaganda and ads. I have been speaking out about the Eckankar cult for years and today we are going to watch several of their ads, watch a tour of their Temple of Eck in Chanhassen, Minnesota and read through the journal they want all members to use daily. I think it is important to speak out about these topics and discuss the coercive control methods and manipulation tactics used to trick people into joining this cult under the guise of singing some Hu and being a part of an all inclusive religion. Media literacy is important and like all cults, Eckankar will prey on vulnerabilities.

episodes.title: Dagmar's Story : Hare Krishna Cult Survivor Shares Abuse
episodes.description:
#harekrishnamovement 
#cultsurvivor 
#cultawareness 

Today, Dagmar joins me to share her powerful story of surviving the Hare Krishna movement (ISKCON)—a group she now identifies as a cult.

I’ve been deep-diving ISKCON on my channel and blog at https://www.dehek.com, exposing the coercive control tactics and controversies that have long plagued this so-called “spiritual movement.” Dagmar’s testimony is one of resilience, clarity, and courage. Her experience also highlights how individuals like myself — especially those of us on the Autism Spectrum — can be uniquely vulnerable to cultish manipulation, and how difficult, yet vital, the road to recovery can be.

This platform exists to hold cult leaders accountable and to offer survivors a soft place to land — a space where their stories are heard, honored, and amplified. I want to thank Dagmar for her trust and vulnerability. It was an honor to meet her, and I wish her continued strength and healing on her journey.

If you or someone you know is currently in ISKCON or another high-control group and wants to share their story, please reach out to me at bethgibbons74@gmail.com or connect via my social media links below. 

You are not alone.

For my past coverage on Hare Krishna (ISKCON): 
Bhakti Vidya Purna Swami, ISKCON, and the Mayapur Gurukula Controversy: https://www.dehek.com/general/anti-mlm-cults/bhakti-vidya-purna-swami-iskcon-and-the-mayapur-gurukula-controversy/
Krishna Cults and Western Offshoots: A Critical Guide: https://www.dehek.com/general/anti-mlm-cults/krishna-cults-and-western-offshoots-a-critical-guide/
The Strange Overlap: Hare Krishna, O9A, 764, and Josh Sutter: https://youtu.be/3AHfm6yJ_IU?si=5q2vopf5j4_nzlmc

episodes.title: THE FULL STORY OF ECKANKAR : FORMER MEMBER REVISITS THE CULT
episodes.description:
#eckankar 
#cultsurvivor 
#cults 

Dive deep into a pivotal moment in spiritual history—a 1995 San Diego Reader investigative piece revealed stunning claims against the movement Eckankar. David C. Lane, the outspoken whistleblower and critic, accused its founder Paul Twitchell of plagiarism and exposed the shadowy origins of the movement. Dodie Bellamy, a former Eckist, sits with David for 9 hours over 2 days to discuss the cult and all the tea! She also visits an Eckist and she and David see Darwin Gross perform and discuss it. In this video, we break down the full story, its fallout, and what it means today. We will discuss John-Roger Hinkins past in Eckankar and you won't believe who else has been in this cult! Get comfy, grab a snack and let's uncover the full story of Eckankar! 

Please do read the full article (it's fabulous!) here:
Former Eckankar re-visits the movement by Dodie Bellamy
https://www.sandiegoreader.com/news/1995/jun/22/cover-fraud-eckankar/

episodes.title: Reacting to the Senate Meeting on HB 162 — DSA PANICS Over Anti-MLM Bill!
episodes.description:
The Direct Selling Association is in full panic mode — and today we’re diving into the Delaware Senate meeting on HB 162, the bill that's sending shockwaves through MLM companies everywhere. 💥

HB 162 is being called the “Anti-MLM Bill” — and for good reason. It aims to bring transparency, accountability, and regulation to predatory multi-level marketing practices that have scammed millions.

Join me live as we:
🔹Watch and react to the Senate hearing in real time
🔹Break down the arguments from both sides
🔹Expose the lobbying tactics of the DSA
🔹Discuss what this could mean for MLMs across America

This is a HUGE moment in the fight against financial abuse disguised as “opportunity.” Don’t miss it!

🛑 MLMs are NOT harmless — they ruin lives.
🎯 Let’s make history and hold them accountable.

*I have tried my best to fix the audio of the meeting. Please bear with me, thanks for your understanding!*

episodes.title: The AntiMLM Bill Just Passed and DSA is PANICKING!
episodes.description:
The Direct Selling Association (DSA) released a desperate update about Delaware’s House Bill 162—and MLM companies are shaking. This bill directly targets the deceptive practices used by multilevel marketing schemes, and the DSA is scrambling to spin it as a threat to "legitimate business."

In this video, we look at the fear-mongering tactics the DSA is using to rally its members—and have a little laugh! We celebrate that the bill was passed as well! 

If you've ever been in an MLM, know someone caught in one, or want to understand how these predatory companies operate under the guise of "opportunity"—this is a must-watch.

🧠 Educate. 🔥 Expose. 💪 Empower.

episodes.title: ECKANKAR: THE PATH OF SPIRITUAL CONTROL
episodes.description:
#eckankar
#cults
#religiouscults

In this livestream, we’re diving into the mysterious world of Eckankar—a lesser-known but still active cult founded by Paul Twitchell in the 1960s. Before starting Eckankar, Twitchell worked his way up in Scientology and even achieved the level of "Clear." But instead of sticking with L. Ron Hubbard's teachings, he borrowed heavily from them—along with ideas from Theosophy, Radhasoami, and other traditions—to create his own spiritual movement.

We’ll explore Twitchell’s early life, the lies he told about his background, and how scholar David C. Lane exposed its plagiarized roots. Lane’s groundbreaking research revealed just how much of Eckankar was copied from other sources—and how Twitchell manipulated his image to appear as a divine messenger.

If you’ve never heard of Eckankar, you’re not alone—but it’s time we start talking about it again. This is a great introduction to this religious cult. 

For my other coverage of the Eckankar cult, see these videos/streams:
Their Glossary of Terms - https://youtube.com/live/eJnQQ3JbURI?feature=share

episodes.title: MLM Cult Forever Living Wants YOU to Pay to Work for Them
episodes.description:
#foreverliving  
#mlmexposed  
#antimlm 

Forever Living, one of the most well-known MLMs in the world, is now charging its distributors a $3 monthly fee just to access their back office and run their so-called "business." In this video, I break down what this fee means, why it's problematic, and how it's yet another example of MLM companies profiting off their own members rather than actual product sales.

This is a classic move used by multi-level marketing schemes to squeeze money from their downlines under the guise of "business tools." But is it ethical? Is it even legal? And how does it reflect on the overall MLM business model?

Let’s talk about it.

👉 Don’t forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more deep dives on scams, cults, and MLM exploitation.

** Copyright Disclaimer: Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Furthermore, all clips are used for fair use commentary, criticism, and educational purposes.  See Hosseinzadeh v. Klein, 276 F.Supp.3d 34 (S.D.N.Y. 2017) Equals Three, LLC v. Jukin Media, Inc., 139 F. Supp. 3d 1094 (C.D. Cal. 2015). As was ruled in Hosseinzadeh v. Klein, 276 F.Supp.3d 34 (S.D.N.Y. 2017), clips from an original work may be used to “comment on and critique a work”, and the use of clips is “reasonable to accomplish the transformative purpose of critical commentary”.  See also NXIVM v. The Ross Institute, Inc., 364 F.3d 471 (2nd Cir. 2004) (quotations from course materials for critical commentary was fair use).  I believe my video is transformative in nature in order to criticize and comment and is not intended as a market substitute for the original video. **
